Package net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.desc.source

Card sources generate lists of cards.
See Also:
for more about card sources.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HasCardCreationSideEffects
    Indicates that this object creates cards as a side effect of its methods.
    HasWeights  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CardSource  
    CardSourceDesc  
    CatalogueSource
    Returns a list of collectible cards from the DeckFormat for this game (from GameContext.getDeckFormat()) where class cards of the casting player's class appear 4x more than neutrals, and no other class cards appear.
    CombinedSource  
    DeckCollectionSource  
    DeckSource
    Returns cards from the player's deck.
    FormatCatalogueSource  
    GraveyardActorsSource  
    GraveyardCardsSource  
    GraveyardMinionsSource Deprecated.
    GraveyardSource Deprecated.
    GraveyardSpellsSource Deprecated.
    HandSource  
    MinionsSource  
    SecretSource  
    ShuffledCardsSource
    Returns all the cards that the specified CardSourceArg.TARGET_PLAYER has shuffled into their deck.
    StoredEntitiesSource
    Retrieves the cards stored in the source Entity or CardSourceArg.SOURCE EntityReference by a StoreEntitySpell.
    TopThreeCardsOfDeckSource
    Returns the top three cards of the deck.
    UncollectibleCatalogueSource  
    UngoroPackRarityWeightedCardSource
    This weighted card source returns legendaries and epics more frequently than normal and only cards from the CardSet.JOURNEY_TO_UNGORO set.
    UnweightedCatalogueSource
    Returns a list of collectible cards from the DeckFormat for this game (from GameContext.getDeckFormat()) of equal probability for all classes and neutrals.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CardSourceArg
